list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX bibframe: <http://id.loc.gov/ontologies/bibframe/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT DISTINCT ?object ?objectValue ?objectMostSpecificTypeLabel
WHERE { ?subject ?property ?object . ?object rdf:value ?objectValue . OPTIONAL { ?object vitro:mostSpecificType ?objectMostSpecificType . ?objectMostSpecificType rdfs:label ?objectMostSpecificTypeLabel . } }
